# Pull Request

## Before submitting a pull request

- Make sure the change is scoped to a single purpose.
- Make sure tests and checks pass.
- Update documentation when behavior changes.

## General steps for completing this pull request

Please review the contributing guidelines: [.github/CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)

### Checklist

- [ ] I ran `pnpm test`.
- [ ] I ran `pnpm run check` (and fixed any issues).
- [ ] I updated documentation if needed.
- [ ] I added or updated tests if needed.
- [ ] My commits follow Conventional Commits.

### Description

Describe what this pull request changes and why.

## Proposed changes

Explain the motivation and context for the change. If this addresses an issue, link it here.

## Types of changes

- [ ] Bugfix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing behavior to change)
- [ ] Documentation change

## Additional context

Add any other context or screenshots that help review (optional).
